BackstoryDef.title: paleontologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] adulthood unearthing the remains of ancient life on a glitterworld where extinct species were reconstructed for study. With the help of drones and AI, [PAWN_pronoun] mapped fossil sites and pieced together the story of evolution long past. [PAWN_pronoun] can identify a bone fragment at a glance but has never had to hunt for food that still moves.

BackstoryDef.title: chef
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] trained as a culinary artist on a glitterworld where food was more performance than sustenance. Each dish was sculpted, printed, and infused with mood-altering nanoflavors. [PAWN_pronoun] can make a meal look like a sunrise but has never had to cook over a fire.

BackstoryDef.title: waiter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in an upscale glitterworld restaurant, serving meals to citizens who no longer needed to eat. [PAWN_pronoun] learned grace, timing, and how to hide disdain behind a perfect smile. [PAWN_pronoun] can balance ten plates but struggles to lift a hammer.

BackstoryDef.title: masseuse
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living easing the tension of glitterworld citizens. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in neural relaxation and tactile therapy, often assisted by subdermal nanogel fields. [PAWN_pronoun] understands anatomy well but has little experience dealing with wounds that bleed.

BackstoryDef.title: c-list actor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] starred in low-budget dramas broadcast across glitterworld colonies. Fame came in flickers, and [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] career waiting for callbacks that never came. [PAWN_pronoun] can fake any emotion, but sincerity eludes [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: IT procurement manager
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] managed AI contracts and software licenses for a glitterworld corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] days mediating between sentient vendor AIs and budget committees.
